attributes.action: Prosecute Tony Blair for War Crimes
attributes.additional_details:
Why Tony Blair must be put to trail for crimes against peace?

• Planning and waging of a war of aggression

• Violation of international treaties

• Participation in a common plan and conspiracy

• Wasting billions of British tax payers money

• The Iraq inquiry: Invasion' WMD

rejection.details: As it currently stands, your e-petition does not ask Government to do anything.
